sentences.en: The preferred foods of snowshoe hares are willow and birch twigs.
sentences.cn: 雪兔最喜欢的食物是柳树和桦树的树枝。

sentences.en: The major concern of the snowshoe hare in the winter is predators.
sentences.cn: 雪靴野兔冬天最大的担忧是捕食者。

sentences.en: Anyway, the snowshoe hare has an adaptation that plays on the same idea.
sentences.cn: 总之，白靴兔有一项进化，原理与其差不多。
